thread.title: 31 Perfectly Snarky Tweets About 'The Bachelor' Season 21, Episode 8

author: Emma Gray
title: 31 Perfectly Snarky Tweets About 'The Bachelor' Season 21, Episode 8
text:
31 Perfectly Snarky Tweets About 'The Bachelor' Season 21, Episode 8 ‚ÄúHow will you support my daughter?‚Äù ‚ÄúSponsored Instagram posts?‚Äù ABC 1 Watching #thebachelor tonight from my hometown, hiring a nanny to bring me sliced cucumbers and a glass of wine (make that a bottle) #excited ‚Äî Kristina Schulman (@kristinaschulma) February 20, 2017 2 ‚Äî Vinny Ventiera (@VINNYVINSANE) February 21, 2017 3 Because nothing says romance like describing your would-be fianc√© as "unpredictable" and repeatedly saying how afraid you are. #TheBachelor ‚Äî outer kase (@worstkase) February 21, 2017 4 ‚Äî Robyn Ross (@RobynRossTV) February 21, 2017 5 I would be nervous to take Nick home...solely because I would be scared that he would steal my jeans #TheBachelor ‚Äî Princess Problems (@PrincessProbz) February 21, 2017 6 ‚Äî Jill Biden (@JillBidenVeep) February 21, 2017 8 Judging by Raven's family, there's not a lot of places to find skinny jeans for men in Hoxie. #TheBachelor ‚Äî Dana Weiss (@Possessionista) February 21, 2017 9 ‚Äî Carly Waddell (@carlywaddell) February 21, 2017 10 I'm liking Raven's parents so much right now that I'd even go frog digging with them. #TheBachelor ‚Äî Andrea Lavinthal (@andilavs) February 21, 2017 11 Nick reacted to the cancer-free announcement like the dad said he's made it a week without having soda. #TheBachelor ‚Äî Jared Freid (@jtrain56) February 21, 2017 12 I would love a full episode where we get to watch the families freak out and clean/redecorate in prep for the hometown dates. #TheBachelor ‚Äî Jenn (@JennFleenor) February 21, 2017 13 Oh good Lord. If Nick makes it out of this church without bursting into flames, he can consider it a win. #TheBachelor üî•üî•üî• ‚Äî Kristen Baldwin (@KristenGBaldwin) February 21, 2017 14 ‚Äî Sean Lowe (@SeanLowe09) February 21, 2017 16 Breaking news: #TheBachelor and ABC have confirmed tonight the Nick is in fact a white man, and Rachel is indeed a black woman ‚Äî Megan Revello (@Megan_Revello) February 21, 2017 17 Rachel's hometown: navigating race relationsCorinne's hometown: navigating the mall #TheBachelor ‚Äî Lindy Segal (@lindysegal) February 21, 2017 18 ‚Äî Olivia Caridi (@OliviaCaridi) February 21, 2017 19 "I haven't seen Corinne this happy since I got her the goose that lays golden eggs from Willy Wonka's factory" -Jim #TheBachelor ‚Äî Cally Logan (@CallyLogan) February 21, 2017 20 Corinne: The dressing room is your holy ground.Cashier: That will be $3423. ‚Äî Corinne's Nanny (@corinnesnanny) February 21, 2017 22 ‚Äî Kristen Baldwin (@KristenGBaldwin) February 21, 2017 23 ‚Äî Jared Haibon (@haibon_jared) February 21, 2017 24 You know, Vanessa's family is less concerned about Nick and more concerned about giving up her Canadian citizenship. #THeBachelor ‚Äî Dana Weiss (@Possessionista) February 21, 2017 25 ‚Äî Kristina Schulman (@kristinaschulma) February 21, 2017 26 "You have a life here. He needs to be in LA for Dancing With the Stars and Family Feud." #TheBachelor ‚Äî Patti Murin (@PattiMurin) February 21, 2017 27 ‚Äî Kathleen Schmidt (@Bookgirl96) February 21, 2017 28 ‚Äî Derik Velasco (@Dvel93) February 21, 2017 29 @ebassclinics met my family we talked mostly about erectile dysfunction at our dinner table.Y'all are glad u didn't watch that #TheBachelor ‚Äî Carly Waddell (@carlywaddell) February 21, 2017 30 GUYS, WE JUST REALIZED IT'S 9:58 AND THAT'S NOT ENOUGH TIME FOR A ROSE CEREMONY AND WHY DO THEY DO THIS TO US. #TheBachelor ‚Äî Bachelor Burn Book (@bachelorburnbk) February 21, 2017 31 If I was on #TheBachelor my hometown date would just be all my relatives trying to warn the person I was dating about how terrible I am ‚Äî elan gale (@theyearofelan) February 21, 2017 
For more on ‚ÄúThe Bachelor,‚Äù check out HuffPost‚Äôs Here To Make Friends podcast below: 
Do people love ‚ÄúThe Bachelor,‚Äù ‚ÄúThe Bachelorette‚Äù and ‚ÄúBachelor in Paradise,‚Äù or do they love to hate these shows? It‚Äôs unclear. But here at ‚ÄúHere to Make Friends,‚Äù we both love and love to hate them ‚Äî and we love to snarkily dissect each episode in vivid detail. Podcast edited by Nick Offenberg.
